resources.string: Depression Test
How often a week do you...
Not at all
Once and a while
Often
Always
Submit
Hello
Have little interest or pleasure in doing things?
feel down, depressed, or hopeless?
Have trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?
Feel tired or have little energy?
Have a poor appetite or overeat?
Feel bad about yourself, or that you are a failure, or have let yourself or your family down?
Have trouble concentrating on things such as reading or watching TV?
Move or speak noticeably slower or faster than usual?
Have thoughts that you would be better off dead or hurt in some way?
You are healthy!
You are likely experiencing mild depression, monitor if symptoms get worse. Do not be alarmed - this should be temporary!
You are likely experiencing moderate depression. It would be worth while to start a discussion about this with your doctor.
You are likely experiencing moderately severe depression, you should seek help from a doctor.
You are likely experiencing severe depression - you should seek help immediately.
